jd: We are seeking a skilled AI/ML Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning, data science, and software development. Responsibilities include designing, developing, and implementing machine learning models, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and optimizing algorithms for performance. Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, and cloud platforms is required. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment are essential.

We are looking for a Data Scientist specializing in FinTech. The ideal candidate will design machine learning models to detect financial fraud and optimize trading strategies. Proficiency in Python, R, and cloud platforms is required.
We are seeking an AI Research Scientist to join our EdTech team. Conduct research in adaptive learning technologies and create AI-driven educational tools to personalize student learning experiences.
